name: MY BEST
sql: playcount > 0 ORDER BY playcount DESC LIMIT 10

folder.name: LEVEL 0
folder.sql: (level <= 0 OR level IS NULL) AND (maxbpm != minbpm)

folder.name: RANK AA
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 77.77 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 88.88

folder.name: RANK A
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 66.66 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 77.77

folder.name: RANK B
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 55.55 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 66.66

folder.name: RANK C
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 44.44 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 55.55

folder.name: RANK D
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 33.33 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 44.44

folder.name: RANK E
folder.sql: (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes >= 22.22 AND (lpg * 2 + epg * 2 + lgr + egr) * 50 / score.notes < 33.33
